summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of The Alleys in Block 1, 10 and 11, H. E. Nelson Addition, being the alleys between 20th Avenue Northwest and 21st Avenue Northwest, from West 77th Street to West 85th Street; and certain other alleys; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 14048 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
